list.abs: according to the cognizance of branch of national environmental protection , the air pollution of our country belongs to fuliginous pollution model .据国家环保部门的认定，我国的大气污染属煤烟污染型。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (originally describing a vapour as 'thick and noxious'): from late Latin fuliginosus, from fuligo, fuligin- 'soot'
